full_summary:
=====================================

**Autonomous Track Geometry Measurement System (ATGMS) Purchase**

**Notice ID:** cb-646-21471710

**Notice Status:** Expired

**Solicitation ID:** 23-58161
**Amendment Count:** 6
**Notice Date:** November 8, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 23, 2023

**Contract Requirements:**

The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking a supplier to provide an industry-proven Autonomous Track Geometry Measurement System (ATGMS) for a research project in collaboration with Transport Canada (TC). The ATGMS will be installed on an NRC-provided freight railcar to measure track geometry with real-time data reporting and transfer.

**Key Requirements:**

* The ATGMS must be capable of installing on an NRC freight railcar.
* The system must perform continuous measurement of track geometry with real-time data reporting and transfer.
* The ATGMS must be able to operate in an unmanned fashion.
